  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.proxy.SenderThreadListener
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.AbstractDefaultFilePlugin
    No longer used/needed (FilePlugins were replaced with Forced Browse). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.BrowserDialog
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.ByteVector
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.common.FileXML
    (2.4.2) Use ZapXmlConfiguration instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.model.HistoryList
    (2.3.0) Replaced with use of HistoryReferencesTableModel. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.view.HistoryReferenceTableModel
    (2.3.0) Superseded by HistoryReferencesTableModel. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.model.HttpMessageList
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.view.MessagePanelsPositionController
    (2.5.0) No longer used/needed. WorkbenchPanel now manages the position of the message panels.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.PopupMenuEmbeddedBrowser
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.view.PopupMenuHistoryReference
    (2.3.0) Superseded by PopupMenuItemHistoryReferenceContainer. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.view.PopupMenuHttpMessage
    (2.3.0) Superseded by PopupMenuItemHttpMessageContainer. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.PopupMenuResend
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.PopupMenuResendSites
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.history.PopupMenuShowInHistory
    (2.5.0) No longer used, replaced by PopupMenuShowInHistory.
    org.zaproxy.zap.view.PopupMenuSiteNode
    (2.3.0) Superseded by PopupMenuItemSiteNodeContainer. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.httputils.RequestUtils
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.proxy.SenderThread
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.proxy.StreamForwarder
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.View.DISPLAY_OPTION_BOTTOM_FULL
    (2.5.0) Use WorkbenchPanel.Layout.EXPAND_STATUS instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.View.DISPLAY_OPTION_LEFT_FULL
    (2.5.0) Use WorkbenchPanel.Layout.EXPAND_SELECT instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.View.DISPLAY_OPTION_TOP_FULL
    (2.5.0) Use WorkbenchPanel.Layout.FULL instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.Constant.FILE_CONFIG_DEFAULT
    (2.4.2) The path does not take into account the installation directory, use Constant.getPathDefaultConfigFile() instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.VariantHeader.injectableHeaders
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Alert.MSG_RELIABILITY
    (2.4.0) Replaced by Alert.MSG_CONFIDENCE. Use of reliability has been deprecated in favour of using confidence.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.ascan.ActiveScanPanel.PANEL_NAME
    (2.3.0) Replaced by ActiveScanPanel.MESSAGE_CONTAINER_NAME.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.search.SearchPanel.PANEL_NAME
    (2.3.0) Replaced by SearchPanel.HTTP_MESSAGE_CONTAINER_NAME.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Alert.SUSPICIOUS
    (2.4.0) Replaced by Alert.CONFIDENCE_LOW confidence. SUSPICIOUS reliability has been deprecated in favour of using CONFIDENCE_LOW confidence.
    org.parosproxy.paros.model.HistoryReference.TYPE_MANUAL
    Use HistoryReference.TYPE_PROXIED instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.Constant.VULNS_BASE
    (2.4.0) Use Constant.VULNERABILITIES_PREFIX instead. It will be removed in a following release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Alert.WARNING
    (2.4.0) Replaced by Alert.CONFIDENCE_MEDIUM confidence. WARNING reliability has been deprecated in favour of using CONFIDENCE_MEDIUM confidence.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionHookMenu.addAnalyseMenuItem(JMenuItem)
    use ExtensionHookMenu.addAnalyseMenuItem(ZapMenuItem menuItem) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionHookMenu.addEditMenuItem(JMenuItem)
    use ExtensionHookMenu.addEditMenuItem(ZapMenuItem menuItem) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionHookMenu.addFileMenuItem(JMenuItem)
    use ExtensionHookMenu.addFileMenuItem(ZapMenuItem menuItem) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionHookMenu.addHelpMenuItem(JMenuItem)
    use ExtensionHookMenu.addHelpMenuItem(ZapMenuItem menuItem) instead.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.pscan.ExtensionPassiveScan.addPassiveScanner(String)
    (2.4.3) Use ExtensionPassiveScan.addPluginPassiveScanner(PluginPassiveScanner) instead, the status of the scanner is not properly set.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionHookMenu.addReportMenuItem(JMenuItem)
    use ExtensionHookMenu.addReportMenuItem(ZapMenuItem menuItem) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionHook.addSiteMapListner(SiteMapListener)
    Replaced by the method ExtensionHook.addSiteMapListener(SiteMapListener). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionHookMenu.addToolsMenuItem(JMenuItem)
    use ExtensionHookMenu.addToolsMenuItem(ZapMenuItem menuItem) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionHookMenu.addViewMenuItem(JMenuItem)
    use ExtensionHookMenu.addViewMenuItem(ZapMenuItem menuItem) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.OutputPanel.appendDirty(String)
    appendDirty has been deprecated in favour of using OutputPanel.append(String)
    org.zaproxy.zap.network.ZapNTLMScheme.authenticate(Credentials, String, String)
    org.zaproxy.zap.control.AddOn.canLoad()
    (2.4.0) Use AddOn.calculateRunRequirements(Collection) instead. Returns false.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.changeDisplayOption(int)
    (2.5.0) Use WorkbenchPanel.setWorkbenchLayout(Layout) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.MainFrame.changeDisplayOption(int)
    (2.5.0) Use MainFrame.setWorkbenchLayout(WorkbenchPanel.Layout) instead.
    org.zaproxy.zap.view.TabbedPanel2.clone(TabbedPanel2)
    (2.5.0) The implementation is not correct, not all state is correctly cloned.
    org.parosproxy.paros.control.Control.createAndOpenUntitledDb()
    (2.5.0) Use just Control.newSession() (or Control.newSession(String, SessionListener)) instead, which already takes care to create and open an untitled database.
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.SSLConnector.createSocket(String, int)
    (2.3.0) No longer supported since it's no longer required/called by Commons HttpClient library (version >= 3.0). Throws UnsupportedOperationException.
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.SSLConnector.createSocket(String, int, InetAddress, int)
    (2.3.0) No longer supported since it's no longer required/called by Commons HttpClient library (version >= 3.0). Throws UnsupportedOperationException.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.report.ReportLastScan.generateHtml(ViewDelegate, Model)
    generateHtml has been deprecated in favor of using ReportLastScan.generateReport(ViewDelegate, Model, ReportType)
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.report.ReportLastScan.generateXml(ViewDelegate, Model)
    generateXml has been deprecated in favor of using ReportLastScan.generateReport(ViewDelegate, Model, ReportType)
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Alert.getAlert()
    (2.5.0) Replaced by Alert.getName(). Use of alert has been deprecated in favour of using name.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.getAuthenticationRealm()
    use #getHostAuthState()
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.View.getDisplayOption()
    (2.5.0) Use MainFrame.getWorkbenchLayout() instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.db.paros.ParosTableHistory.getHistoryList(long)
    (2.3.0) Use ParosTableHistory.getHistoryIds(long) instead. If the thread-safety provided by the class Vector is really required "wrap" the returned List with Collections.synchronizedList(List) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.db.paros.ParosTableHistory.getHistoryList(long, int)
    (2.3.0) Use ParosTableHistory.getHistoryIdsOfHistType(long, int...) instead. If the thread-safety provided by the class Vector is really required "wrap" the returned List with Collections.synchronizedList(List) instead.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.getHostConfiguration()
    no longer applicable
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpResponseHeader.getHttpCookies()
    Use the HttpResponseHeader.getHttpCookies(String) method to take into account the default domain for cookie
    org.zaproxy.zap.network.ZapNTLMScheme.getID()
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.View.getMessagePanelsPositionController()
    (2.5.0) No longer in use/working, use MainFrame.setResponsePanelPosition(org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.ResponsePanelPosition) instead.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.getMethodRetryHandler()
    use HttpMethodParams
    org.zaproxy.zap.view.ContextIncludePanel.getPanelName(Context)
    (2.2.0) Replaced by ContextIncludePanel.getPanelName(int). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.view.ContextExcludePanel.getPanelName(Context)
    (2.2.0) Replaced by ContextExcludePanel.getPanelName(int). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpMessage.getParamNameSet(HtmlParameter.Type, String)
    (2.4.2) Use HttpMessage.getParamNameSet(org.parosproxy.paros.network.HtmlParameter.Type) instead, it will be removed in a following release.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.getProxyAuthenticationRealm()
    use #getProxyAuthState()
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.ConnectionParam.getProxyChainSkipName()
    (2.3.0) Replaced by ConnectionParam.getProxyExcludedDomains() and ConnectionParam.getProxyExcludedDomainsEnabled(). Note: Newer regular expression excluded domains will not be returned by this method.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.getRecoverableExceptionCount()
    no longer used Returns the number of "recoverable" exceptions thrown and handled, to allow for monitoring the quality of the connection.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Alert.getReliability()
    (2.4.0) Replaced by Alert.getConfidence().
    org.parosproxy.paros.db.RecordAlert.getReliability()
    (2.4.0) Replaced by RecordAlert.getConfidence().
    org.zaproxy.zap.spider.SpiderParam.getScope()
    (2.3.0) Replaced by SpiderParam.getDomainsAlwaysInScope() and SpiderParam.getDomainsAlwaysInScopeEnabled().
    org.zaproxy.zap.spider.SpiderParam.getScopeText()
    (2.3.0) Replaced by SpiderParam.getDomainsAlwaysInScope() and SpiderParam.getDomainsAlwaysInScopeEnabled(). Note: Newer regular expression excluded domains will not be returned by this method.
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.HttpRequestHeader.getSecure()
    Replaced by HttpRequestHeader.isSecure(). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.option.OptionsParamView.getShowMainToolbar()
    (2.5.0) Use OptionsParamView.isShowMainToolbar() instead. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.getSoTimeout()
    Use HttpConnectionParams.getSoTimeout(), HttpConnection.getParams().
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.getTabbedOldSelect()
    (2.5.0) No longer in use, it returns a new TabbedPanel2.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.getTabbedOldStatus()
    (2.5.0) No longer in use, it returns a new TabbedPanel2.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.getTabbedOldWork()
    (2.5.0) No longer in use, it returns a new TabbedPanel2.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.getVirtualHost()
    no longer applicable
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.isHttp11()
    Use HttpMethodParams.getVersion()
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.isStaleCheckingEnabled()
    Use HttpConnectionParams.isStaleCheckingEnabled(), HttpConnection.getParams().
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.isStrictMode()
    Use HttpParams.setParameter(String, Object) to exercise a more granular control over HTTP protocol strictness.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionPopupMenuItem.isSuperMenu()
    (2.3.0) Not used. It will be removed in a following release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.PluginFactory.loadedPlugin(String)
    (2.4.3) Use PluginFactory.loadedPlugin(AbstractPlugin) instead, the status of the scanner is not properly set.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.AbstractFrame.loadIconImages()
    (2.4.2) Use DisplayUtils.getZapIconImages() instead. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.zaproxy.zap.authentication.AuthenticationHelper.notifyOutputAuthSuccessful()
    use AuthenticationHelper.notifyOutputAuthSuccessful(HttpMessage) instead.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.ExtensionPopupMenu.prepareShow()
    (2.3.0) The preparations should be made when the methods isEnableForComponent(Component) and/or isEnableForMessageContainer(MessageContainer) are called. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.print(String)
    Use HttpConnection.print(String, String) Writes the specified String (as bytes) to the output stream.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.printLine(String)
    Use HttpConnection.printLine(String, String) Writes the specified String (as bytes), followed by "\r\n".getBytes() to the output stream.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.history.PopupMenuPurgeSites.purge(SiteMap, SiteNode)
    As of release 2.5.0, replaced by ExtensionHistory.purge( org.parosproxy.paros.model.SiteMap, org.parosproxy.paros.model.SiteNode)
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.readLine()
    use #readLine(String)
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.recycle()
    no longer supported and will be removed in the future version of HttpClient
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.removeSplitPaneWork()
    (2.5.0) No longer in use, it does nothing.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Alert.setAlert(String)
    (2.5.0) Replaced by Alert.setName(java.lang.String). Use of alert has been deprecated in favour of using name.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.autoupdate.OptionsParamCheckForUpdates.setCheckOnStart(int)
    (2.3.0) Replaced by OptionsParamCheckForUpdates.setCheckOnStart(boolean). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.setConnectionTimeout(int)
    Use HttpConnectionParams.setConnectionTimeout(int), HttpConnection.getParams().
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Alert.setDetail(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, HttpMessage)
    (2.2.0) Replaced by Alert.setDetail(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, int, int, HttpMessage). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.View.setDisplayOption(int)
    (2.5.0) Use MainFrame.setWorkbenchLayout(org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.Layout) instead.
    org.zaproxy.zap.view.MainToolbarPanel.setDisplayOption(int)
    (2.5.0) No longer in use, the tool bar buttons are updated at the same time as the layout.
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.LogPanel.setDisplayPanel(HttpPanel, HttpPanel)
    (2.5.0) No longer used/needed.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.search.SearchPanel.setDisplayPanel(HttpPanelRequest, HttpPanelResponse)
    (2.5.0) No longer used/needed.
    org.parosproxy.paros.db.paros.ParosTableHistory.setHistoryTypeAsTemporary(int)
    (2.5.0) Use HistoryReference.addTemporaryType(int) instead.
    org.zaproxy.zap.db.sql.SqlTableHistory.setHistoryTypeAsTemporary(int)
    (2.5.0) Use HistoryReference.addTemporaryType(int) instead.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.setHostConfiguration(HostConfiguration)
    no longer applicable
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.setHttp11(boolean)
    Use HttpMethodParams.setVersion(HttpVersion)
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.setMethodRetryHandler(MethodRetryHandler)
    use HttpMethodParams
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.VariantAbstractQuery.setParams(int, Map)
    (2.5.0) use VariantAbstractQuery.setParameters(int, List) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.HostProcess.setPluginRequestCount(int, int)
    (2.5.0) No longer used/needed, Plugin's request count is automatically updated/maintained by HostProcess.
    org.parosproxy.paros.network.ConnectionParam.setProxyChainSkipName(String)
    (2.3.0) Replaced by ConnectionParam.setProxyExcludedDomains(List).
    org.parosproxy.paros.db.RecordAlert.setReliability(int)
    (2.4.0) Replaced by RecordAlert.setConfidence(int).
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.Alert.setRiskReliability(int, int)
    (2.4.0) Replaced by Alert.setRiskConfidence(int, int). Use of reliability has been deprecated in favour of using confidence
    org.zaproxy.zap.spider.SpiderParam.setScopeString(String)
    (2.3.0) Replaced by SpiderParam.setDomainsAlwaysInScope(List)
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.setSendBufferSize(int)
    Use HttpConnectionParams.setSendBufferSize(int), HttpConnection.getParams().
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.option.OptionsParamView.setShowMainToolbar(int)
    (2.5.0) Use OptionsParamView.setShowMainToolbar(boolean) instead. It will be removed in a future release.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.setSoTimeout(int)
    Use HttpConnectionParams.setSoTimeout(int), HttpConnection.getParams().
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.setStaleCheckingEnabled(boolean)
    Use HttpConnectionParams.setStaleCheckingEnabled(boolean), HttpConnection.getParams().
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.setStrictMode(boolean)
    Use HttpParams.setParameter(String, Object) to exercise a more granular control over HTTP protocol strictness.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.setTabbedOldSelect(TabbedPanel2)
    (2.5.0) No longer in use, it does nothing.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.setTabbedOldStatus(TabbedPanel2)
    (2.5.0) No longer in use, it does nothing.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.setTabbedOldWork(TabbedPanel2)
    (2.5.0) No longer in use, it does nothing.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.HostProcess.setTestCurrentCount(Plugin, int)
    (2.5.0) No longer used/needed, Plugin's progress is automatically updated/maintained by HostProcess.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.setVirtualHost(String)
    no longer applicable
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.shutdownOutput()
    unused
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel.splitPaneWorkWithTabbedPanel(TabbedPanel, int)
    (2.5.0) No longer in use, it does nothing.
    org.parosproxy.paros.core.scanner.PluginFactory.unloadedPlugin(String)
    (2.4.3) Use PluginFactory.unloadedPlugin(AbstractPlugin) instead, which ensures that the exact scanner instance is unloaded.
    org.parosproxy.paros.db.paros.ParosTableHistory.unsetHistoryTypeAsTemporary(int)
    (2.5.0) Use HistoryReference.removeTemporaryType(int) instead.
    org.zaproxy.zap.db.sql.SqlTableHistory.unsetHistoryTypeAsTemporary(int)
    (2.5.0) Use HistoryReference.removeTemporaryType(int) instead.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.ascan.ActiveScan.updatePluginRequestCounts()
    (2.5.0) No longer used/needed, the request count is automatically updated/maintained by HostProcess.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.autoupdate.AddOnsTableModel(Comparator, AddOnCollection, int)
    (2.5.0) Replaced by AddOnsTableModel.AddOnsTableModel(AddOnCollection, int). It will be removed in a future release.
    org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection(String, int, String, String, int, Protocol)
    use #HttpConnection(String, int, String, int, Protocol)
    org.parosproxy.paros.extension.history.LogPanel()
    (2.5.0) Use LogPanel.LogPanel(ViewDelegate) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.MainFrame(int)
    (2.5.0) Use #MainFrame(OptionsParam, HttpPanelRequest, HttpPanelResponse) instead.
    org.zaproxy.zap.extension.search.SearchPanel()
    (2.5.0) Use SearchPanel.SearchPanel(ViewDelegate) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.SessionDialog(Frame, boolean, String)
    No longer used/needed. It will be removed in a future release. Use the constructor SessionDialog.SessionDialog(Frame parent, boolean modal, String title, String rootName) instead.
    org.parosproxy.paros.view.WorkbenchPanel(int)
    (2.5.0) Use WorkbenchPanel#WorkbenchPanel(OptionsParam, AbstractPanel, AbstractPanel, MainToolbarPanel) instead.
